subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The L.A. Angels held a monstrous 15 ½-game lead after they beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 5-4, on Wednesday night. But the Rays have frittered away big leads in the past.
snippet: The L.A. Angels held a monstrous 15 ½-game lead after they beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 5-4, on Wednesday night. But the Rays have frittered away big leads in the past.
